articles.title: 49ers QB Purdy (toe) limited in return to practice
articles.summary: 49ers quarterback Brock Purdy returned to practice Wednesday, his first since aggravating a toe injury during a Week 4 matchup against the Jaguars.

articles.title: Vikings' McCarthy: Ankle better but not yet 100%
articles.summary: J.J. McCarthy said his high right ankle sprain is "getting there" but is not yet 100%, adding that he received "well-respected second opinions" that indicated his timetable to return could be up to six weeks.
